snippet.title: Salad Fields Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1162430/Salad_Fields/
https://resnijars.itch.io/salad-fields

Salad Fields is a DREAMYQUEER experience.

In this adventure-puzzle game you explore surreal lands and meet strange folks, including... Yippie the gay leather-mouse who bakes doughnuts using vegetables,  Kizzy the computer who fears Y2K, Myrtyl the anti-cop queer skater punk, and Fancy Andy the ampersand-shaped butler and wannabe beekeeper.

There are two gameplay modes for flexible play-styles: "Puzzle mode" provides a puzzley challenge
and  "Exploration mode" lets you walk right through the puzzles, making the game's various bizarre worlds accessible to anyone.   There are over 100  puzzles,  an hour of original music, a whole bunch of locations and characters and things, and  plenty of secrets abound!

The game and soundtrack can be purchase on both Steam and itch.io

The devs:
Resni is the creator of the unofficial cult-classic "Mibibli's Quest", and j a r s received their MFA and likes puzzles.

We are also queer furries and romantic partners. Salad Fields might seem very silly (and it is) but we feel it reflects our truths as strange misfits in various ways. We hope that you find something in it you resonate with. :3
